VLIB_calcBlobMinEnclosedRect

Detailed Description


Functions

int32_t VLIB_calcBlobMinEnclosedRect (int32_t numPolygonPt, VLIB_blobAnalysis_point *polygonBoundary, VLIB_blobAnalysis_box *box)

Function Documentation

int32_t VLIB_calcBlobMinEnclosedRect ( int32_t  numPolygonPt,
VLIB_blobAnalysis_point *  polygonBoundary,
VLIB_blobAnalysis_box *  box 
)

Description:
This function finds the minimlal enclosed rectangle of a blob. The enclosed polygon parameters (which is generated by VLIB_calcBlobMinEnclosedPolygon) of the blob are input to this module. The enclosed polygon parameters consist of the number and position of vertices. The parameters of the minimal enclosed rectangle which consists of The center position(x,y), the rotation angle and the width/height are output in structure VLIB_blobAnalysis_box
Parameters:
[in] numPolygonPt The number of vertices of the enclosed polygon (Q32.0)
[in] polygonBoundary The pointer to vertices position array of the enclosed polygon (VLIB_blobAnalysis_point)
[out] box The pointer to minimal enclosed rectangle parameters (VLIB_blobAnalysis_box)
Assumptions:
  • I/O buffers are assumed to be not aliased.
Implementation Notes:
  • This code is fully interruptible
  • This code is compatible with C66 floating-point processors
Performance Notes:
NA
